title: Am I the only one....

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Who sees Assassins Creed every time they look at Elementalist Lux's emblem?

replies.body:
I honestly hadn't seen the Elementalist Lux icon before now, but yes. I totally see what you mean.

Maybe it's just because I've been playing AC a lot recently.
That's what I get for being a Talon main

Thats the first thing I thought too. As a huge assasins creed fan who has played all the games at least twice I thought Riot was gonna do a collab or some shit, but no. Just an expensive chroma for lux -_-
And thus, riot will be sued.
personally I saw a halo covenant symbol more but I can kinda see the assassins' creed resemblance.
